post.body: I wish it could be lack of sunlight bothering me but we're sunny and blue here for days. Blah.
Careful or he'll give you a Matchbox of an Escalade. :)
Oh, I have a list a mile long. :) And, at the top of it is a Kindle. I don't think Santa's going to be that kind though. :)
Ooooo, can't wait to bathe my little stinker in it. Yay.
Oh good! :)
Looks interesting for husband but he's getting a new electronic drum set for xmas so I'm not showing it to him. :)
You're right that your reserved candle is lovely! Very lovely. Makes me nervous sitting that close to the edge there. :)
CONGRATS!!! Rock on you wild creating fool!
Yes, we are. Got the tree on Sunday. We'll start the long decorating process. I think I'm going to let my mil do much of it.
Not that I recommend my method of getting to sleep, mind you? "Have two kids and call me in the morning!"
Wow. I used to have terrible insomnia but since I had kids I fall asleep within seconds of hitting the bed.
Oh and furthering the confusion . . . I don't know WHERE I got pj's out of your tweet. Temporary insanity? Wishful thinking?
Yea, that'll do it. And, probably risky getting to sleep tonight, huh? Good luck!
Oh, I thought you meant that my pj's belonged to Jimmy Choo. I was gonna say he could send me some of his! :)
Loving the aquamarine (my birthstone) but wow you are picking jewelry with serious presence tonight. Dang.
I'm late but I'm ready! :)
Good luck with the Crossbill. I want pictures! :)
Oh yea, etsy is a $$$ sink, alright. But, oh my goodness, what a great place to go for handmade gifts. Love it!
Yes, it is dangerous. Seriously, seriously dangerous!
Thanks. I'll check it out. Appreciate your expertise!
oh, I did NOT need to know about that store. Sigh. I adore japanese fabric even when I have no idea what to do with it.
Thanks. The lower price range is more likely. I'll check out the brands you recommend. Thanks!
congrats! That's awesome!
I love it when an app "quits unexpectedly" right after I told it to quit. So, really, I was totally expecting it. Really!
Sounds like a fun day. hang in there!
Oh, I was long in bed. That was a pre-planned, timed post posted by the sleepless elves at WordPress! :)
CONGRATS! That's awesome!
Squirrel? You DEFINITELY need to borrow my Rat Terrier! :)
Gosh. I was just wondering what that limit might be if it even existed! :)
have fun!!!
So lovely. Instant favorite!
They are lovely, Wende. Really lovely.
Drat it! Greg signed up 2 days ago. Oh well.
That's a fact. There is no such thing as too many Danish butter cookies. NUM!
7 mos old are pretty special! :)
Yay! Congrats! Even a far away look is a look!
TGIF! And, I'm home now, alone, in an empty house. Well, 'cept for the dog and that's all to the good! Ahhhhh!
I listened to Xmas music all day. Wonderful. Albuquerque is one of my favorite cities. -- well, Santa Fe really! :)
Me neither! Isn't it winter break yet?
That's a lovely big horn pic. There are some near my where my folks live. I dream of seeing them. They are elusive.
Thanks. First time I've submitted anything. I'm expecting kind rejections. :)
Sorry about the layoffs. That stinks. When do you leave for NM?
I've noticed the blog neglect but your Twitter activity has helped! :)
I can't look at those shoes too long or I'll start ovulating! :)
That oak bowl was an instant add to my favs list. Hey, anytime someone uses whilst in a sentence, they have won me over! :)
Okay, those teeny shoes slay me. Absolutely KILL me.
Woah! I'm practically live for BoE? Amazing!
Hang in there. We all have days like that and sometimes we need to "medicate" our troubles. Thinking of you.
Good luck with appt today! Hope it goes beautifully!
Good luck with the finches, Bev. I hope to see pics! (Vicarious birdiing!)
Thanks, Birdchick! We thoroughly enjoyed that vid here. Can't wait to see John Stewart on Monday! :)
Ooooo, no, that does not sound good at all.
Congrats. Heaters only malfunction during the worst storms. Glad you're back on the warm side!
Sorry about the ice storm. Hope your power is back soon!
all I know about greyhounds is keep them on leash when not fenced in. they can run and run and run!
OMG! Those sheepster buttons. Too crazy cute!
We're getting some rain but I'm getting conflicting reports on how cold/wet it will be here.
Just picture how happy Lewis and Clark were to find the coast and then spend the winter there . . . yikes! It gives one pause.
Totally Rufous!
we don't have snow or anything but oh my goodness did I have rude drivers to deal with. So impressed when they save 1/8 sec . . .
Awwwww. I'm loving the xmas tunes, in fact, I am playing them in my car and house constantly, too. I'm obnoxious.
I recommend Amazon.com! No mall is worth it. Cute UPS and FedEx guys bring it to your door! :)
What a gorgeous picture!
maybe Hawaii avoided the cold precipitation! Maybe.
Okay, that was just wrong!
Okay, I need to get my c-o-f-f-e-e going too. And, get the fire going again too. Last day before vacation!
My "they" can't decide. 1 says "chance of snow" and 1 says nothing about snow at all. Seems unlikely though.
I used to live up in the Sierra Nevada at 7,000+ feet and 12" is still a lot, even at that altitude.
LOVE Mexican coke. Although . . . I like it best with lime squeezed into it.
Good laugh on the MacBook Wheel. Everything is only a few hundred clicks away! Keyboards . . . so overrated!
Congrats!
Especially when one's alarm fails to go off . . . sigh.
Congrats on the Northern Hawk Owl. Very cool! I'd love to see BoWax in any number!
Bummer! Guess thinking it sounds like a bird is the best course of action right now then. Joys of home ownership!
Thanks, Scott! Thanks for visiting my other site and poking around! Appreciate it!
Thanks, Betsy! I felt it was time!
Only if by 'improvement' you mean 'reason to get a new washer.'
Blog Update - Wordless Wednesday - One year ago this week http://tinyurl.com/6fxav9
I am unable to fight off the blah, unmotivated feeling I've had since the holidays. Totally sucks!
Is it bedtime yet? I'm beat. And, two great books are sitting on my bedside table.
Yay! Just fixed a really annoying blog problem. Woot!
yup. it's that time. insert daily morning whine. waaaaaahhhhhh! (hopeful note: tomorrow is saturday. yay!)
Had to restart my computer to get out on the Internet again. Grumble. Waste of time. Grumble. Whine. Moan. Complain.
Dang it! The fire won't start today. Brrrrr! Gotta go fight it again.
Blog Update - Sky Watch Friday http://tinyurl.com/5bo2fu
Ruby and I are cold so she joined me under my blankie on the couch. Good girl, Ruby.
insert daily whine about having to start my day . . .
Dear Birding Friends, I do not own a good pair of bins. Any suggestions to add to my WishList? Tweet me!
Blog Update - Reading books is such a good thing . . . http://tinyurl.com/6a8fb5
Blog Update - Feeling blessed http://tinyurl.com/5a3bo2
GAWD, I love my husband. Tell him I'm craving red meat (anemia) and he brings home to ginormous t-bone steaks. What a man!
Blog Update - Choosing just the right one . . . http://tinyurl.com/66vp2h
Blog Update - Fancy-schmancy Wall-to-wall Carpeting http://tinyurl.com/5wydjh
Really regretting not stopping at the hardware store and getting fatwood for fire starting yesterday. Cannot get my fire to start . . .
Ruby got cold and came up and asked could she please cuddle under the blanket with me. Of course, I had to accommodate her. Too sweet.
yay . . . finally done installing cs3. -llm.
Feeling stupid about wasted time and effort when I just didn't understand what I was doing. Sigh. CS3 totally trashed my day.
Wonderful evening. MIL came to dinner. Yummy chicken, delish noodles, green beans. And, then awesome local ice cream and PepFarm cookies.
maybe i should just clean out my old office and find the dang disk instead of trying this work-a-round. Ugh, though, that sounds like work.
omg. how long is this install going to take? espec when I know it won't work for me in the long run. drat. it. all.
finally my fire is crackling away nicely and actually heating the house. It's only 11am, after all and I was up at 7am. whine.whine.whine.
fighting with adobe installers. too much fun.
And, I can only hope that when I "submitting" some writing, I spelled everything right and used correct verb tenses. Moron! LOL.
gulp. I just submitting some writing to an online publisher. nerves. nerves. nerves.
chilly this morning. but the fire is cooperating and starting nicely!
Blog Update - Ruby Tuesday http://tinyurl.com/6o26tk
Ruby cracks me up. when the house is cold, she MUST be under blankies curled up with us. Too funny.
Must sleep now.
How, for the love of all things good, how does one forget they used the last of the coffee?
How
Blog Update - Ravens, again http://tinyurl.com/5k47lm
$#*&@*$&#!!! Our new carpet isn't available until mid-January. That means no new carpet for party on 23rd. AGGGGGGGGH!
My daughter is practicing Deck the Halls on her flute. She sounds soooooo well.
I just joined the birds Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/birds and you can too. Please Retweet.
have you checked out this week's bird photography weekly? What, you haven't? Well, get over there! http://tinyurl.com/5dg8t8
Uber-excited. Two mini-poems of mine were accepted to this online poetry mag: www.ahandfulofstones.com/ W00T!
Gack! I better move my gardenia up close to the house. This is the first night of actual freeze.
Our zip code based weather service got it wrong. Low of 41F? Ha! Try 32 on my back deck this morning.
Gaah! Staff morning meetings. Not good. Not happy. Whine. Whine. Whine.
Blog Update - Still missing my birds http://tinyurl.com/688ugb
My daughter is playing xmas carols on her flute. Dang! She's good!
GAWD! I hate weekend kids' tv. Gack!
Brrrr. 33F outside. Rain is due to start at 9:30 or so (according to Accuweather). Wonder how far away the snow will be. . .
The fire is roaring, Towhees are twittering outside, we're braced for the coming weather, but now, it's calm and quiet.
Blog Update - A Sunday Meme http://tinyurl.com/6gonwa
Never fails. On the weekends, if I get up early to have some quiet time, the kids are up too early too. Son just ran out post-bad dream.
Blog Update - Distractions http://tinyurl.com/6nvsl2
Gage to his dad: Let's play football. But no tackling, okay?
Poor Ruby. She hates being cold but won't wear a sweater. The only benefit: curling up under the blankies with me on the couch.
Dang. Just checked the weather for the land of my birth (Glasgow, MT). Monday, low will be -24F. Yikes.
If you are in the snow and need a reminder of the fun of snow . . . http://tinyurl.com/6hgqce
Damn it feels good to know I don't have work for two full weeks. Even cleaning my carpet can't dampen my spirits!
We're having a 2 day break from bad weather. 42F and sunny today. Soaking up Vit D before the deluge on Monday.
Blog Update - Let Sleepiing Dogs Lie http://tinyurl.com/8eyuet
I slept in this morning until 7:08am. Gawd, I love vacation!
check that. I meant 1/2 hour. Oh good, he just pulled in the driveway.
Okay. Party started an hour ago. Husband is not yet home from taking DD to flute lesson. I am trying not to freak.
All dolled up for a holiday party. Woot!
The excitement level here on the last day of school before Winter Break is a bit hard to take.
Dang fire will NOT start today. Harumph!
Blog Update - 10 Favorite Holiday Songs http://tinyurl.com/3o32eh
Blog Update - Ravens are my thing . . . http://tinyurl.com/9utqqo
Blog Update - Artful Bird Blogging http://tinyurl.com/9c6b46
Time for bed. 5:30 is going to roll around mighty early tomorrow. Yawn.
My walk yielded 5 year birds today including a Belted Kingfisher! Woot!
My daughter tells me she has befriended the spider in her bathroom. She tells it her secrets.
Nearly finished packing up Christmas. Just lights off the tree now . . . and all the things that I won't see until the boxes are put away.
If you need a smile today, click here http://tinyurl.com/95aypu
Blog Update - Blogging Year in Review http://tinyurl.com/9sxrd3
Gawd. What a great book. Loving it.
What I'm reading . . . The Letters by Fiona Robyn. http://www.fionarobyn.com/
Silence reigns again. Good night, dear children.
Way to totally mess up my blog . . . think I got it all put back together. Phew.
